entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Pangnirtung
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pangnirtung Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: E 57 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this morning then snow at times heavy. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
